banner.description-1: I am a Computer Science student at UNI, with a specialized focus on frontend development. Currently, I am an active member of the Computing Centered Association at the Faculty of Sciences, where we engage in innovative projects and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies.
banner.description-2: My experience includes collaborations with startups, where I have contributed to the development of their MVPs through the creation of landing pages, applying UX/UI skills. I consider myself a proactive person, passionate about learning about technology and business, and I am always looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills in these fields.
banner.description-3: Connect with me to exchange ideas and opportunities in the world of technology ;)
banner.description:
I am a Computer Science student at UNI, with a specialized focus on frontend development. Currently, I am an active member of the Computing Centered Association at the Faculty of Sciences, where we engage in innovative projects and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies. My experience includes collaborations with startups, where I have contributed to the development of their MVPs through the creation of landing pages, applying UX/UI skills. I consider myself a proactive person, passionate about learning about technology and business, and I am always looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills in these fields.
Connect with me to exchange ideas and opportunities in the world of technology ;)

projects.warmi-ventures-description: Warmi Ventures is a startup incubator that helps entrepreneurs develop their ideas. It was worked with Astro and React.
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, collaborating with startups and groups from my university
projects.water-quality-description: Water quality data is displayed using charts with chart.js, the project is done with React and the backend is connected via websockets.
projects.consulta-ya: Consulta Ya is a startup that helps doctors find consulting room rentals. It was worked with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
projects.cepre-smart: Cepre Smart is a startup focused on pre-university education. It was worked with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
projects.skin-glow: Layout of the Aruma brand website where you can see its information, products, and contact area. It was worked with HTML and CSS.
projects.ecommerce-description: E-commerce platform built with React featuring shopping cart functionality, product filtering, search capabilities, and responsive design.

experience.description: I have been able to experiment with various technologies, here are the most representative ones
